name: We Are Leaving
short_description: Push a button on the app and tell everyone, your spouse, sister, brother, friends, but especially your children (who are scattered from one end of the mega-mall to the other) that you are leaving!  Ideally, you open app and press one button and it sends text messages to all on list. With one touch you can toggle your names on/off the send list before you press send. Preset messages would be "WE'RE LEAVING NOW!', "MEET ME AT THE CAR IN 10 MINUTES OR YOU CAN WALK HOME!" or a custom message. There would of course be an initial setup. This app would be greatly useful for medium and large families, for school trips and other large group outings and trips.
summary: Mobile Device App to let family know you are leaving the Mall
